DOC.brief_summary: Assess pain , function , hip knee strength kinematics trunk low limbs ascent descent stair addition neuromuscular training hip muscle strengthening .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Muscle Strengthening Associated With Neuromuscular Stimulus Patients With Patellofemoral Pain During Negotiating Stairs
DOC.criteria: Sedentary woman , previous knee pain last 3 month least two follow activity : sit long period , walk stair , squat , run jump Lower limb surgery , patella displacement knee instability Heart locomotor disorder might influence evaluation
